amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Prepaid Wireless Surcharge Act:

(3) Prepaid wireless telecommunications service means a wireless telecommunications service that allows a caller to dial 911 to access the 911 system, which service must be paid for in advance and is sold in predetermined units or dollars of which the number declines with use in a known amount;
(6) Seller means a person who sells prepaid wireless telecommunications service to another person; and
(7) Wireless telecommunications service means mobile service as defined by 47 C.F.R. 20.3, as such section existed on July 19, 2012.
